price: Ampa sε Yɛasεe nkuro a atwa mo ho ahyia no, na Yεkͻͻ so yii nsεnkyerεnee (pii) adi kyerεε wͻn sεdeε ɛbɛyɛ a wͻbεsan wͻn akyi (afiri wͻn bͻne mu).
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مَا حَوۡلَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡقُرَىٰ وَصَرَّفۡنَا ٱلۡأٓيَٰتِ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَرۡجِعُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walaqad ahlaknā mā ḥawlakum mina al-qurā waṣarrafnā al-āyāti laʿallahum yarjiʿūna
